short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate reading and debating companion - fact check anything in seconds with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever seen anything online, that you're not quite sure is right, but can't be bothered to "just google it"? Of course you have! We all have, every day! Introducing - Fact Check Anything!

Fact Check Anything (or FCA for short) is a browser extension powered by an all-knowing AI (also known as ChatGPT), that evaluates any statement, and provide you with a truth score and a brief explanation. If you really want to dive into further details, you can easily get the full context at the click of a button (literally, it's called "elaborate").

FCA is a super easy, super handy tool that you never knew that you couldn't live without - whether you're reading articles or debating with someone on Facebook, Twitter or Reddit - you'll always have the upper hand with FCA!

Works in any language!

Please note that FCA requires a valid license. Get yours today at https://www.factcheckanything.com
